Text.Page:
(Unknown forces attacked the {@Rgn:84001} two days ago.)

(All of {@Rgn:103} is under the control of the invaders, though the {@Rgn:84001} remains free thanks to the intervention of {@Creature:248#2008}, who erected a shield around the city.)

(We're requesting assistance from Allemantheia. If anyone can cut through these strange creatures, it's the high elves.)

(If they can't, we might all be lost.)"Incredible."
